name: A Journey and a Blank Slate
name_original: A Journey and a Blank Slate
description:
This is sandbox adventure, based on multiple boardgames, like “Xia” and “Mage Knight”. In a world filled with monsters, you have a blank slate to become whatever you want, as long as you are famous. You’ll start with nothing. You may hunt for monsters to get gold and fame, or you may look for opportunities in villages and towns.

Your goal is to reach 20 points of fame, which can be achieved by defeating certain monsters and completing quests.

In case of any questions, just hover over buttons and tiles to get more information.
